mapper.sql: select template_id as templateId, graph_ids as graphIds, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, description as description, last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, page as page, gson_data as gsonData from monitor_graph_template
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_graph_template( template_id, graph_ids, last_modify_time, description, last_modify_user, page, gson_data ) values( #{templateId}, #{graphIds}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{description}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{page}, #{gsonData} )
